```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(DALEXtra)
set.seed(400)
```

# Read Data

```{r}
data_split <- readRDS(file = "../data/data_split.RData")
```

```{r}
final_results <- readRDS(file = "../models/final_results.RData")
finalize_workflow_fitted <- final_results$.workflow[[1]]
```

### Extract Training Data

```{r}
data_train <- training(data_split)

features_train <- data_train %>% 
  select(bill_length_mm, 
         bill_depth_mm, 
         flipper_length_mm, 
         body_mass_g, 
         sex)

labels_train <- data_train %>% select(species)

data_train
```

### Extract Test Data

```{r}
data_test <- testing(data_split)
predictions_test <- finalize_workflow_fitted %>% predict(data_test, type = "class")
probabilities_test <- finalize_workflow_fitted %>% predict(data_test, type = "prob")

data_test <- data_test %>%
  cbind(predictions_test, probabilities_test)

data_test
```

# Check for Bias

```{r}
class_metrics <- metric_set(f_meas,
                            precision, 
                            recall,
                            sensitivity,
                            specificity)
```

```{r}
data_test %>%
  group_by(sex) %>%
  class_metrics(truth = species, estimate = .pred_class)
```

```{r}
data_test %>%
  group_by(sex) %>%
  roc_auc(truth = species, estimate = c(.pred_Adelie, .pred_Chinstrap, .pred_Gentoo))
```

# Create Explainer

```{r}
explainer_final <- finalize_workflow_fitted %>% 
  explain_tidymodels(
    data = features_train,
    y = as.integer(labels_train[[1]])
  )

explainer_final
```

### Local Explanations

```{r}
random_data_point <- data_test %>% sample_n(1)
random_data_point
```

```{r}
explainer_final %>%
  predict_parts(
    new_observation = random_data_point,
    type = "shap"
  ) %>%
  plot()

```

### Global Explanations

```{r}
explainer_final %>%
  model_parts(N = 1000) %>%
  plot()

```

```{r}
explainer_final %>%
  model_profile(
    variables = "flipper_length_mm",
    variable_splits = list("flipper_length_mm"=unique(data_train$flipper_length_mm)),
    N = NULL,
    groups = "sex"
  ) %>%
  plot()
```
